value.verse: I will sing a new song to my God, *
value.halfverse: for you are great and glorious, wonderful in strength, invincible.

value.verse: Let the whole creation serve you, *
value.halfverse: for you spoke and all things came into being.
no one is able to resist your voice.
value.verse: You sent your breath and it formed them, *
Mountains and seas are stirred to their depths, *
value.halfverse: rocks melt like wax at your presence.

value.verse: But to those who fear you, *
No sacrifice, however fragrant, can please you, *
value.halfverse: but whoever fears the Lord shall stand in your sight for ever.
